maqras.text: 70|19|Jaqinan, inson kamtoqat [-u haris] ofarida sudaast
70|20|Har goh ʙadi [va musiʙate] ʙa u rasad, ʙetoʙi mekunad
70|21|Va har goh xuʙi ʙa u rasad, ʙozdoranda [va ʙaxil] megardad
70|22|Magar namozguzoron
70|23|Hamon kasone, ki ʙar namozhojason hamesa pojdori mekunand
70|24|Va kasone, ki dar amvolason haqqi [muajjanu] ma'lume hast
70|25|Baroi mustamand va mahrum
70|26|Va [hamon] kasone, ki ruzi cazoro tasdiq mekunand
70|27|Va kasone, ki az azoʙi Parvardigorason metarsand
70|28|[Caro ki] Be gumon, az azoʙi Parvardigorason dar amon natavonand ʙud
70|29|Va kasone, ki sarmgohhojasonro nigah medorand
70|30|Magar ʙo hamsaronu kanizone, ki moliki onho hastand, ki [dar in surat] sarzanise ʙar onho nest
70|31|Pas, har kas farotar az inhoro ʙixohad, onon mutacovizon hastand
70|32|Va kasone, ki amonatho va pajmonhojasonro rioja mekunand
70|33|Va kasone, ki ʙa sahodathoi xud mutaahhidand
70|34|Va kasone, ki ʙar namozason pojdori mekunand
70|35|Inon dar ʙoƣho [-i ʙihist] giromi dosta mesavand
70|36|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] kofironro ci sudaast, ki ʙa suji tu mesitoʙand
70|37|[Va] Az rostu cap guruh-guruh [hucum meovarand]
70|38|Ojo har kadom az onho [ʙo on a'moli nopisandason] tama' dorand, ki dar ʙihisti purne'mat [-i ilohi] darovarda savand
70|39|Hargiz cunin nest! Be gumon, Mo onhoro az on ci [xud] medonand, ofaridaem
70|40|Pas, ʙa Parvardigori masriqho va maƣriʙho savgand mexuram, ki Mo jaqinan qodirem
70|41|Bar in ki [kasoni digare] ʙehtar az esonro cojguzin kunem va Mo [ʙaroi ancomi in kor] darmonda va notavon nestem
70|42|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] ononro ʙa holi xud voguzor, to dar ʙotili xud furu ravand va ʙozi kunand, to ʙa ruze ʙirasand, ki ʙad-eson va'da doda sudaast
70|43|[Hamon] Ruze, ki sitoʙon az qaʙrho xoric mesavand, gui ʙa suji ʙutho medavand
70|44|[Dar hole ki] Casmhojason [az sarmu vahsat] ʙa zer aftoda va zillat [-u xori] ononro pusidaast. In hamon ruzest, ki ʙa eson va'da doda mesavad
71|1|Be gumon, Mo Nuhro ʙa suji qavmas firistodem [va guftem]: «Qavmi xudro – pes az on ki azoʙi dardnok ʙa suroƣason ojad – husdor deh [va ʙitarson]
71|2|[Nuh] Guft: «Ej qavm, man ʙaroi sumo ʙimdihandae oskor hastam
71|3|Ki Allohro ʙiparasted va az U parvo namoed va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
71|4|[Pas, agar cunin karded, Alloh taolo] gunohoni sumoro meomurzad va sumoro to zamoni muajjane muhlat medihad, zero hangome ki acali ilohi faro rasad, ta'xir naxohad dost, agar medonisted»
71|5|Va Nuh [pas az nasihatu da'vat] guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙa rosti, ki man qavmi xudro saʙu ruz [ʙa imon] da'vat kardam
71|6|Vale da'vati man cuz ʙa gurezason [az haq] naafzud

71|7|Va man har ci da'vatason kardam, to sarancomi ononro ʙijomurzi, angustoni xudro dar gushojason furu kardand va liʙoshojasonro [ʙa xud] pecidand va [dar muxolifat] isror [-u pofisori] kardand va ʙa siddat gardankasi va takaʙʙur namudand
71|8|On goh onhoro ʙo sadoi ʙaland [va oskor] da'vat kardam
71|9|On goh oskoro ʙarojason guftam va dar nihon ʙaroi [har kadom az] onon ʙajon kardam
71|10|Pas, guftam: «Az Parvardigori xes omurzis ʙixohed [ki] ʙe gumon, U ʙisjor omurzanda ast
71|11|To az osmon [ʙoroni] pajopaj ʙar sumo ʙifiristad
71|12|Va sumoro ʙo amvolu farzandoni ʙisjor jori kunad, ʙa sumo ʙoƣhoi [sarsaʙz] ʙidihad va ʙarojaton cujʙorho[-i cori] qaror dihad
71|13|Sumoro ci sudaast, ki ʙaroi Alloh taolo azamat [-u sukuh] qoil nested
71|14|Dar hole ki sumoro dar marohili gunogun ofarid
71|15|Ojo nameʙined, ci guna Alloh taolo haft osmonro ʙar farozi jakdigar ofarid
71|16|Va mohro dar mijoni osmonho mojai rusnoi qaror dod va xursedro caroƣi [furuzone] gardonid
71|17|Va Alloh taolo sumoro hamcun gijohe az zamin rujonid
71|18|Sipas sumoro ʙa on [zamin] ʙozmegardonad va ʙori digar sumoro ʙerun meovarad
71|19|Va Alloh taolo zaminro ʙaroi sumo gusturda soxt
71|20|To az rohhoi pahnovari on [ʙa suji maqsadi xud] raftuomad kuned»
71|21|Nuh guft: «Parvardigoro, onho az man nofarmoni namudand va az kase pajravi kardand, ki molu farzandas cize cuz zijonkori ʙar u naafzudaast
71|22|Va [on pesvojoni gumroh] najrangi ʙuzurge ʙa kor ʙurdand
71|23|Va guftand: «Ma'ʙudoni xudro raho nakuned va [ʙa xusus] «Vadda» va «Suvo'» va «Jaƣus» va «Ja'uq» va «Nasr»-ro [raho nakuned]
71|24|Ba rosti, onho ʙisjorero gumroh kardand va [tu ej Parvardigor] sitamgoronro cuz gumrohi maafzoj»
71|25|[Sarancom onon] Ba kajfari gunohonason [hamagi] ƣarq sudand, pas, dar otas [-i duzax] darovarda sudand va dar ʙaroʙari [azoʙi] ilohi jovar [-u madadgore] ʙaroi xud najoftand
71|26|Nuh guft: «Parvardigoro, hec jak az kofironro ʙar ruji zamin ʙoqi maguzor
71|27|Caro ki agar onhoro ʙoqi guzori, ʙandagonatro gumroh mekunand va cuz [nasle] ʙadkor va kofir ʙa vucud nameovarand
71|28|Parvardigoro, maro va padaru modaram va har on kasero, ki ʙo imon voridi xonai man mesavad va [tamomi] mardoni mu'min va zanoni mu'minro ʙijomurz va sitamgoronro cuz halokat [va noʙudi] maafzo»
